list.name: Changes
list.comment: Add .nojekyll file to configure GitHub Pages

task.summary: Default task
Init commit
Refactor app structure: Move invitation and RSVP into standalone components with routing support.

Add RSVP submission status checks and improved user feedback
- Introduced logic to check and display existing RSVP submissions. - Added dynamic messages for personalized feedback based on RSVP status. - Enhanced UI with loading states and disabled states for buttons. - Updated styles for consistent appearance of new elements. - Refactored invitation and RSVP components to handle submission states efficiently.

Add GitHub Actions workflow for automated deployment to GitHub Pages
- Created `.github/workflows/deploy.yml` for Angular app deployment. - Updated `README.md` with deployment details and site URL. - Added specific npm build scripts for easier production and GitHub Pages deployment.
Increase Angular component style size limits in `angular.json` configuration
Update GitHub Actions workflow: enable Pages and adjust artifact path
Fix asset paths for GitHub Pages: switch from absolute to relative paths for proper loading
Add new invitees to guest list json file
Further improvements
Further improvements 2#
Further improvements 3#
WIP design

Add Prettier configuration and integrate Tailwind CSS plugin
- Configure `.prettierrc` for project-wide code formatting - Add `prettier` and `prettier-plugin-tailwindcss` to dev dependencies - Update `package.json` with format scripts (`format` and `format:check`) - Apply consistent formatting to HTML templates, including invitation and RSVP components

Add custom CSS and fonts for wedding page design
- Implement detailed CSS styles for the wedding page, including design system variables, responsive layouts, and button styles - Add American Oak and Olympian Roman fonts to public assets - Include font documentation and license files for reference
Remove American Oak and Olympian Roman fonts along with associated documentation and files
Relocate American Oak and Olympian Roman fonts to `src/assets` and update CSS font-face paths.

Add guest list, translation service, and multilingual support
- Populate `public/guest-list.csv` and `public/guest-list.json` with detailed invitee data - Introduce `TranslationService` to manage multilingual translations in `src/app/translation.service.ts` - Provide localized strings for `de`, `en`, and `ro` languages, supporting personalized greetings and RSVP responses

Update guest list, translations, and invitation template
- Add new invitees to `guest-list.json` and `guest-list.csv` - Update invitee attributes (names, genders, languages) to improve data accuracy - Localize date and time strings in `TranslationService` with support for `de`, `en`, and `ro` - Modify invitation template to use dynamic date and time from translations
Add .nojekyll file to configure GitHub Pages

MESSAGE.value: Init commit
Refactor app structure: Move invitation and RSVP into standalone components with routing support.

Add RSVP submission status checks and improved user feedback
- Introduced logic to check and display existing RSVP submissions. - Added dynamic messages for personalized feedback based on RSVP status. - Enhanced UI with loading states and disabled states for buttons. - Updated styles for consistent appearance of new elements. - Refactored invitation and RSVP components to handle submission states efficiently.

Add GitHub Actions workflow for automated deployment to GitHub Pages
- Created `.github/workflows/deploy.yml` for Angular app deployment. - Updated `README.md` with deployment details and site URL. - Added specific npm build scripts for easier production and GitHub Pages deployment.
Increase component style size limits in `angular.json` to 8kB (warning) and 16kB (error).
Increase Angular component style size limits in `angular.json` configuration
Update GitHub Actions workflow: enable Pages and adjust artifact path
Remove leading slashes from asset and API paths for improved compatibility with relative URLs.
Fix asset paths for GitHub Pages: switch from absolute to relative paths for proper loading
Add new invitees to guest list json file
